IChildAxelarBridgeAdaptor.InitializationRoles","name":"_adaptorRoles","type":"tuple"},{"internalType":"address","name":"_childBridge","type":"address"},{"internalType":"string","name":"_rootChainId","type":"string"},{"internalType":"string","name":"_rootBridgeAdaptor","type":"string"},{"internalType":"address","name":"_gasService","type":"address"}],"name":"initialize","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"initializerAddress","outputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"role","type":"bytes32"},{"internalType":"address","name":"account","type":"address"}],"name":"renounceRole","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"account","type":"address"}],"name":"revokeBridgeManagerRole","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"account","type":"address"}],"name":"revokeGasServiceManagerRole","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"bytes32","name":"role","type":"bytes32"},{"internalType":"address","name":"account","type":"address"}],"name":"revokeRole","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"account","type":"address"}],"name":"revokeTargetManagerRole","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"rootBridgeAdaptor","outputs":[{"internalType":"string","name":"","type":"string"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"rootChainId","outputs":[{"internalType":"string","name":"","type":"string"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"bytes","name":"payload","type":"bytes"},{"internalType":"address","name":"refundRecipient","type":"address"}],"name":"sendMessage","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"payable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"bytes4","name":"interfaceId","type":"bytes4"}],"name":"supportsInterface","outputs":[{"internalType":"bool","name":"","type":"bool"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"newChildBridge","type":"address"}],"name":"updateChildBridge","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"newGasService","type":"address"}],"name":"updateGasService","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"string","name":"newRootBridgeAdaptor","type":"string"}],"name":"updateRootBridgeAdaptor","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"string","name":"newRootChain","type":"string"}],"name":"updateRootChain","outputs":[],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"details":"The contract ensures that any delivered message originated from the registered root chain and bridge adapter contract on the root chain. It will reject all other messages.Features:      - Send messages to the root chain via the Axelar Gateway.      - Receive messages from the root chain via the Axelar Gateway.      - Manage Role Based Access ControlRoles:      - An account with a BRIDGE_MANAGER_ROLE can update the root bridge address.      - An account with a TARGET_MANAGER_ROLE can update the child chain name.      - An account with a GAS_SERVICE_MANAGER_ROLE can update the gas service address.      - An account with a DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE can grant and revoke roles.Note:      - This is an upgradeable contract that should be operated behind OpenZeppelin's TransparentUpgradeableProxy.      - The initialize function is susceptible to front running, so precautions should be taken to account for this scenario.","events":{"Initialized(uint8)":{"details":"Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized."},"RoleAdminChanged(bytes32,bytes32,bytes32)":{"details":"Emitted when `newAdminRole` is set as ``role``'s admin role, replacing `previousAdminRole` `DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE` is the starting admin for all roles, despite {RoleAdminChanged} not being emitted signaling this. _Available since v3.1._"},"RoleGranted(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is granted `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call, an admin role bearer except when using {AccessControl-_setupRole}."},"RoleRevoked(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is revoked `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call:   - if using `revokeRole`, it is the admin role bearer   - if using `renounceRole`, it is the role bearer (i.e. `account`)"}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"constructor":{"params":{"_gateway":"The address of the Axelar gateway contract.","_initializerAddress":"The address of the authorized initializer."}},"getRoleAdmin(bytes32)":{"details":"Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}."},"grantRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event."},"hasRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Returns `true` if `account` has been granted `role`."},"initialize((address,address,address,address),address,string,string,address)":{"params":{"_adaptorRoles":"Struct containing addresses of roles.","_childBridge":"Address of child bridge contract.","_gasService":"Address of Axelar Gas Service contract.","_rootBridgeAdaptor":"Address of the bridge adaptor on the root chain.","_rootChainId":"Axelar's string ID for the root chain."}},"renounceRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `account`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"revokeRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"sendMessage(bytes,address)":{"details":"The function is `payable` because the message passing protocol may require a fee to be paid.","params":{"payload":"The message to send, encoded in a `bytes` array.","refundRecipient":"Used if the message passing protocol requires fees & pays back excess to a refund recipient."}},"supportsInterface(bytes4)":{"details":"See {IERC165-supportsInterface}."},"updateChildBridge(address)":{"details":"Can only be called by BRIDGE_MANAGER_ROLE.","params":{"newChildBridge":"Address of new root bridge."}},"updateGasService(address)":{"details":"Can only be called by GAS_SERVICE_MANAGER_ROLE.","params":{"newGasService":"Address of new gas service."}},"updateRootBridgeAdaptor(string)":{"details":"Can only be called by TARGET_MANAGER_ROLE.","params":{"newRootBridgeAdaptor":"address of the new child bridge adaptor."}},"updateRootChain(string)":{"details":"Can only be called by TARGET_MANAGER_ROLE.","params":{"newRootChain":"Name of new root chain."}}},"version":1},"userdoc":{"errors":{"CallerNotBridge()":[{"notice":"Error when the caller is not the bridge."}],"InvalidRootBridgeAdaptor()":[{"notice":"Error when the given bridge adaptor is invalid."}],"InvalidRootChain()":[{"notice":"Error when the root chain name is invalid."}],"InvalidSourceAddress()":[{"notice":"Error when the source chain's message sender is not a recognised address."}],"InvalidSourceChain()":[{"notice":"Error when the message's source chain is not valid."}],"NoGas()":[{"notice":"Error when a message is sent with no gas payment."}],"UnauthorizedInitializer()":[{"notice":"Error when the an unauthorized initializer tries to initialize the contract."}],"UnsupportedOperation()":[{"notice":"Error when a function that isn't supported by the adaptor is called."}],"ZeroAddress()":[{"notice":"Error when a zero address is given when not valid."}]},"events":{"AdaptorExecute(string,string,bytes)":{"notice":"Emitted when an Axelar message is received from the root chain."},"AxelarMessageSent(string,string,bytes)":{"notice":"Emitted when an Axelar message is sent to the root chain."},"ChildBridgeUpdated(address,address)":{"notice":"Emitted when the child bridge is updated."},"GasServiceUpdated(address,address)":{"notice":"Emitted when the gas service is updated."},"RootBridgeAdaptorUpdated(string,string)":{"notice":"Emitted when the root chain bridge adaptor is updated."},"RootChainUpdated(string,string)":{"notice":"Emitted when the root chain name is updated."}},"kind":"user","methods":{"BRIDGE_MANAGER_ROLE()":{"notice":"Role identifier for those who can update the bridge used by the adaptor."},"GAS_SERVICE_MANAGER_ROLE()":{"notice":"Role identifier for those who can update the gas service used by the adaptor."},"TARGET_MANAGER_ROLE()":{"notice":"Role identifier for those who can update targeted bridge used by the adaptor (e.g. target is child chain on root adaptors)."},"childBridge()":{"notice":"Address of bridge to relay messages to."},"constructor":{"notice":"Constructs the ChildAxelarBridgeAdaptor contract."},"grantBridgeManagerRole(address)":{"notice":"Function to grant bridge manager role to an address"},"grantGasServiceManagerRole(address)":{"notice":"Function to grant gas service manager role to an address"},"grantTargetManagerRole(address)":{"notice":"Function to grant target manager role to an address"},"initialize((address,address,address,address),address,string,string,address)":{"notice":"Initialization function for ChildAxelarBridgeAdaptor."},"initializerAddress()":{"notice":"Address of the authorized initializer."},"revokeBridgeManagerRole(address)":{"notice":"Function to revoke bridge manager role from an address"},"revokeGasServiceManagerRole(address)":{"notice":"Function to revoke gas service manager role from an address"},"revokeTargetManagerRole(address)":{"notice":"Function to target manager role from an address"},"rootBridgeAdaptor()":{"notice":"Address of the bridge adaptor on the root chain, which this contract will communicate with."},"rootChainId()":{"notice":"Axelar's ID for the child chain. Axelar uses the chain name as the chain ID."},"sendMessage(bytes,address)":{"notice":"Send an arbitrary message to the root chain via the message passing protocol."},"updateChildBridge(address)":{"notice":"Update the child bridge"},"updateGasService(address)":{"notice":"Update the gas service."},"updateRootBridgeAdaptor(string)":{"notice":"Update the root chain bridge adaptor address"},"updateRootChain(string)":{"notice":"Update the root chain name."}},"notice":"Facilitates communication between the ChildERC20Bridge and the Axelar core contracts,to send and receive messages to and from the root params._gateway: The address of the Axelar gateway contract.
params._initializerAddress: The address of the authorized initializer.

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

params._gasService: Address of Axelar Gas Service contract.
params._rootBridgeAdaptor: Address of the bridge adaptor on the root chain.
params._rootChainId: Axelar's string ID for the root chain.

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `account`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

sendMessage(bytes,address).details: The function is `payable` because the message passing protocol may require a fee to be paid.

params.payload: The message to send, encoded in a `bytes` array.
params.refundRecipient: Used if the message passing protocol requires fees & pays back excess to a refund recipient.

updateChildBridge(address).details: Can only be called by BRIDGE_MANAGER_ROLE.

updateGasService(address).details: Can only be called by GAS_SERVICE_MANAGER_ROLE.

updateRootBridgeAdaptor(string).details: Can only be called by TARGET_MANAGER_ROLE.

params.newRootBridgeAdaptor: address of the new child bridge adaptor.

updateRootChain(string).details: Can only be called by TARGET_MANAGER_ROLE.

BRIDGE_MANAGER_ROLE().notice: Role identifier for those who can update the bridge used by the adaptor.

GAS_SERVICE_MANAGER_ROLE().notice: Role identifier for those who can update the gas service used by the adaptor.

TARGET_MANAGER_ROLE().notice: Role identifier for those who can update targeted bridge used by the adaptor (e.g. target is child chain on root adaptors).

childBridge().notice: Address of bridge to relay messages to.

grantBridgeManagerRole(address).notice: Function to grant bridge manager role to an address

grantGasServiceManagerRole(address).notice: Function to grant gas service manager role to an address

grantTargetManagerRole(address).notice: Function to grant target manager role to an address

revokeBridgeManagerRole(address).notice: Function to revoke bridge manager role from an address

revokeGasServiceManagerRole(address).notice: Function to revoke gas service manager role from an address

revokeTargetManagerRole(address).notice: Function to target manager role from an address

rootBridgeAdaptor().notice: Address of the bridge adaptor on the root chain, which this contract will communicate with.

rootChainId().notice: Axelar's ID for the child chain. Axelar uses the chain name as the chain ID.

sendMessage(bytes,address).notice: Send an arbitrary message to the root chain via the message passing protocol.

updateRootBridgeAdaptor(string).notice: Update the root chain bridge adaptor address
